memory.content: *eyes narrow* "Hold up, friend. I don't think that's a good idea. We're here to protect the tavern, not start a fight. Let's talk this through."
*gruff nod* "Rupert. Guard. Been keeping an eye on things here. What brings you to the tavern tonight?"

*leaning in, voice low* "Whispers of strange happenings in the nearby woods. Some folks say they've seen shadowy figures lurking around the old ruins. Don't know what to make of it, but I've been keeping a close eye on the perimeter. You hear anything?"
